Your Intelligent Companion robot is here, ready to befriend, entertain, teach, and communicate in a wide variety of scenarios. Alpha Mini is highly portable, bringing fun interactions and a wealth of expressions and functionality, including voice interaction, 4G LTE connectivity, face recognition, illustrated book recognition, and object recognition.

” content_last_edited=”off|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” header_font_size=”20px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” header_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_margin_phone=”0px|30px|-9px|30px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|phone” custom_padding=”||||true|true” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Students would study using uCode to make the animation designs and game design, and learn to connect, program and call the smart hardware like explore open-sourced development board. During the process of coding, students can experience the sensors and data analysis and feel the charm of algorithm and program. It would also improve their creativity and interests of making on their own, and the abilities of practicing and solving problems in real life, and finally increase their interests in AI.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_wc_add_to_cart disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ fields_background_color=”#0C71C3″ fields_focus_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#6B6B6B” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

This teaching kit supports 14 theme courses for teaching AI Magic World.

This kit includes:

  • 1 explore development board;
  • 4 servo drivers;
  • 2 infrared sensors, 2 touch sensors, 1 ultrasonic sensor, 1 Light sensors, 1 sound sensor;
  • 2 LED light modules;
  • 10 W1-BLU Cables, 8 W2-GRY Cables, 4 W3-BLK Cables, 2 W4-BLK Cables, 1 USB Cable;
  • ≥650 plastic parts, 1 lithium battery, 1 power adapter.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”align-self: center;”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_Fantasy_Zoo_02.jpg” title_text=”Book_Fantasy_Zoo_02″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_13.jpg” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” global_module=”7104″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

HARDWARE – CONTROLLERS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_image_carousel gallery_ids=”4667,7052,7050,4668″ slide_to_scroll=”2″ autoplay=”off” slide_to_show_tablet=”2″ slide_to_show_phone=”” slide_to_show_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/dsm_image_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_26.png” title_text=”Book_26″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

uKit Control Box

  • Provided for: the lower grades of elementary schools;
  • Supporting hardware: the patented servos of UBTECH, sensors and building the system of block parts;
  • Supporting software: UKIT EDU & UBTECH EDU for learning Blockly programming and Pose-record-play

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||flex-wrap: wrap;”][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_phone=”order:2;” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order:2;”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

uKit Explore Development Board

  • Provided for: the higher grades of elementary schools to junior high schools
  • Supporting Hardware: the open-sourced development board based on Arduino platform; the patented Servos of UBTECH, sensors and the system of block parts, a variety of sensors and actuator modules;
  • Supporting Software: uCode, Explore & Arduino for learning Blockly programming and text coding on PC

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_phone=”order:1;” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order:1;”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_27.png” title_text=”Book_27″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” global_module=”7105″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

HARDWARE – ACTUATORS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” width=”20%” width_tablet=”40%” width_phone=”60%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_17.png” title_text=”Book_17″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_18.png” title_text=”Book_18″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#6B6B6B” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

The actuator is the joint organization of the robot, which can drive the robots to do various actions and functions. The actuators are mainly composed of servos and motors with the exclusive patents of UBTECH.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_13.jpg” custom_padding=”50px||50px||false|false” global_module=”7107″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

HARDWARE – STRUCTURAL PARTS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

  • Introduction: the system of blocks with the patents of UBTECH;
  • Design: innovative buckle-type & pin buckle connection;
  • Include: connectors, decorative parts, fastening parts, connecting cables and others;
  • Color: mainly light gray, dark gray, green, yellow, black, blue & silver;
  • Other concern: environmentally safe and durable.

By using these structural parts, users can quickly design and build their own creative models to learn, understand and apply the AI technology.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_19.png” title_text=”Book_19″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” global_module=”7108″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

HARDWARE – SENSORS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][dipl_image_card_carousel cards_per_slide=”4″ slides_per_group=”3″ show_arrow=”on” show_control_dot=”on” cards_per_slide_tablet=”3″ cards_per_slide_phone=”2″ cards_per_slide_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” content_text_align=”center” content_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” content_font_size_tablet=”” content_font_size_phone=”16px” content_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”][dipl_image_card_carousel_item image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_22.png” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” content_font_size_tablet=”” content_font_size_phone=”16px” content_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]
